## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G06580](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G06580)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PPR1</u>
- **Gene Name:** pentatricopeptide repeat 1
- **Description:**   Pentatricopeptide repeat (PPR) superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2009155
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
